BOOK.Name: Ἔσδρας αʹ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the second Book of Esdras
BOOK.Note: In LXX, Esdras A' corresponds to the Slavonic (and other) Esdras II.

BOOK.Name: Ἔσδρας βʹ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the first Book of Esdras
BOOK.Note: In LXX, Esdras B' corresponds to the Slavonic (and other) Esdras I (Chapters 1 to 10) and Nehemiah (Chapter 11 to end).
